author: Greg Skellorn
comment: Superb app. Wanted something to consolidate a couple of different cameras that came with their own bespoke apps and for various reasons I was completely unimpressed with several that I tried - then I found the free version of this. Scanned the network and immediately found and configured both cameras, the interface is highly polished and user friendly, it's full of useful options, the PTZ controls are brilliant... I could even flip the controls just vertically for one camera that irritatingly had them back to front just in that direction. Immediately bought the pro version to get rid of the ads (not that they're intrusive) and unlock recording and chromecast facilities. Very happy!

author: Richard Browne
comment: I am dumb.I have a degree in networking but can't get any of 20 different cameras I've tried to  work. Sent 14 back to vendors stuck with 6. (Not including ring door bell in this statement, it just worked )... of the other 6 cams I got 1 popped up in this app... hopefully I might figure  out some of the other 5 tomorrow. ....

author: Mark Astorga
comment: Great app with its integrated features. But has limited support on some ipcam/DVR (like my Annke wifi ipcam with 4ch DVR model N441L). In my personal testing, using network scan - advance mode. It can detect the cameras using several listed model configurations in the database, but all fails to display a video stream/feed. All fails even re-configuring. I hope there will be more support in the future. Thanks.

author: Stevie Ray
comment: I have tried them all and I have nothing but good things to say about Tiny Cam. it works great all the time, better than the axis software I run on a PC and alot more features too. great job programmers you got it right! kudos

author: Ciprian Tudoran
comment: I bought the app for the motion detection feature, which is not working as advertised. It should save footage seconds before motion was detected, but it save the footage after motion has actually passed, therefore unuseful content. I got in touch with the developer, but after some checks that the settings are correct he simply disappeared.

Found this app works brilliantly with my SV3C cameras although they're not on the  list.  I have tried other apps including the one recommended by the  camera manufacturer and the NVR manufacturer but I  could never get the individual camera that triggered the motion detection to alert me it was always the same camera as if it was the default. This app alerts me from each individual camera that's detected any motion.   I don't have pan & tilt or audio cameras but so far everything else that I want  works and I'm very pleased with this app, hence I give it 5 star.

author: James
comment: I've been using this for a long time and love it. The only thing that would make it perfect would be able to drag and drop video cameras around to a new location on the screen when you're viewing them all at once.

author: A Google User
comment: Edit 1/2018: I've been using this app for years now, and the developer continues to provide many updates, adds new features, and has done a great job keeping this a great app. The problem I had previously had been fixed quite a while ago, but I neglected to update my review. Five stars now, really happy with it!   -------- This app works reasonably well with my camera, until I try to use ssl for privacy. At that point, it fails to connect to my camera, while other apps are able. Unfortunately, that's one feature that's critically important to me.  I'm sure it's a nightmare, to support hundreds of camera models, but when I emailed dev for support, I never received an answer.

author: Sir Max
comment: Getting a lot of timeouts and dropped frames. On iPhone I don't have these issues. I have 13+ ipcams.

author: Unknown User
comment: Thank you for this app.   I have a Zomodo (Nightwatcher) camera setup, it's not the best system (cheap) but I am now finally able to use this app (with VPN access to my router using DDNS) to view my cameras anywhere in the world!   I am giving it a 5 stars rating because great effort has gone into this apps functional, yet beautiful design.   Thanks.

reply.author: Tiny Solutions LLC
reply.content: Thanks for your pleasant feedback. Yes, I'm the developer behind this app. Best regards, Alex.

author: Jennifer Knaack
comment: Set up took me a little time, but the program is versatile and has a lot of functions. I love the picture-in-picture function and the ability to lay out multiple cameras, with sound, in a single view. I use this app with cheap generic Chinese IP cameras and use the app as a baby monitor at night.

author: Sergio Gallo
comment: I used to love this app but since I bought a new Tenvis TH-661 camera I am disappointed by the lack of support for the 17 characters UID P2P protocol.  When I try to configure the camera for remote access with my 17 characters UID, the app tells me that the UID needs to be 20 characters and doesn't allow me to progress.  Please fix this asap and I will edit my review

reply.author: Tiny Solutions LLC
reply.content: There are several P2P providers available on the market. The app works only with 20 characters UIDs. Sorry. No fix possible at the moment. Best regards, Alex.

author: Bubba Ham
comment: Setup is not for the faint of heart. Contacted support via email. They never responded. Figured it out on my own

author: Steven Ulsas
comment: Had to have my son set it up for me.  Not tech savvy.  Need to have some tech experience,  I think

author: Paul
comment: This is my must-have tool to deal with a mix of different brand IP cameras and allowing me to group them as I see fit. To view what's happening around and inside our house, I installed this on both my phone as well as my two Android TVs. So easy to setup and once done you can backup your setup to Google Drive or several other cloud storage providers for easy installation on any subsequent device.

author: Scott Almond
comment: Professionally developed IP camera software at a low price. Developer is very active, adding new features and fixing issues. Lovely material design UI. Every feature you could wish for.

author: A Google User
comment: Used to be good but crashing now all the time.  Linksys Wvc200. Also no sound. Will give 5 star again if corrections are made soon

reply.author: Tiny Solutions LLC
reply.content: Please contact app support by email for troubleshooting. We will fix the issue. Best regards, Alex.

author: Santhosh Kumar Poornachandran
comment: I have already being using another similar app. But honestly I loved this app the moment I installed it. Have unique features which i was looking for long time in Android DVR app. Keep the good work.

author: Darren Swift
comment: The 2 way mic doesn't work no way to get in touch to cancel and get a refund waste of money the only reason it got 1 star is because I couldn't leave any less don't believe the 24hr policy I've had no joy

reply.author: Tiny Solutions LLC
reply.content: We do not see any email from you. Please try again and send your order number for refund. Best regards, Alex.

author: Eaman Semmakie
comment: I have spent ages looking for app that will work with 3 different (v cheap cameras). This app, after a learning curve, it is amazing. Truly the best. 4 Cameras working, port forwarding working. Many thanks to the developers! You guys have talent!

author: Charles Ollis
comment: It's great. It actually does so much to where I'm still discovering all its features

author: Alex Diaz
comment: This thing won't work outside my wifi even w ports fowarding, and  server and bg activated worthless app.

author: Leon Neo
comment: Excellent app. Where can I view the current list of cameras that are flagged by Network Scanner for vulnerabilities?

reply.author: Tiny Solutions LLC
reply.content: There is no such list of vulnerable cameras available. Best regards, Alex.

author: Renato Tuveri-Ellis
comment: A fantastic app, worthy every single cent. The only functionality I'm missing is the possibility to define "screens" with different set of cameras, for instance "Home" "Office" etc..

author: Dan Wray
comment: Keeps crashing my cameras. If I open the phone after leaving it all night, the widget won't update until I open the app. But when I do it slams my cameras with so many requests that they crash and reboot.

I uninstalled. They want me to enable untrusted certicates in security settings and I'm not gonna do that! The developer obviously wants people to enable untrusted certificates so he can spy on u! U don't need a college degree to figure this out! 😬

author: A Google User
comment: Great app for monitoring you're camera's. I wish there would be more support for generic NVR's that work with XMeye

author: DrChinmay Nayak
comment: Very easy to setup, but sound is not coming from tv while casting. Also  I should be able to download it on android tv but it again asking for payment. Please sovereign this issue

reply.author: Tiny Solutions LLC
reply.content: 1) Google Cast audio will be added one day. 2) You should not be charged again if you use the same Google account you bought the app from. Best regards, Alex.

author: Bri Eva
comment: Works great with my foscam. The foscam app did not send movement alerts or allow recording to my phone.  This app does both. So far so good.

author: Robbie Ramdisk
comment: Recording configured more than 1 minute results in a 0 byte file (lost recording). This is occurring on a Android 6 phone, tablet and Shield TV. Plenty of ram/disk space. Waited for hours for any background trans-coding. Tried with 1-5 frame rates. The Swiss army knife isn't of much use.

reply.author: Tiny Solutions LLC
reply.content: What exact camera model do you have? Please contact app support by email for troubleshooting. Best regards, Alex.

author: Cheyenne Aberle
comment: Best IP camera app out there! Easy to setup and use, advanced features, works on all my devices, always works!

author: Euan O'Donnell
comment: Would be better if I could access my camera's TF storage to view saved files. Is this function possible?

author: Jazer Martinez
comment: I was able to view 3 Wyze camera live after assigning a channel on each camera. I just ordered 3 more Wyze camera now that I have this app to view them live simultaneously.

author: David Blair
comment: Have been using the free version for several years and decided to upgrade to Pro. Very reasonable cost to feature ratio. Will recommend to others.

author: Stefano Prandi
comment: Sarebbe utile poter sincronizzare le impostazioni tra diversi dispositivi nella stessa network senza passare dal backup ma automaticamente.

author: Mo Rahim
comment: Useful especially for option detected email alerts and Cloud recording!

reply.author: Tiny Solutions LLC
reply.content: There is no way to send emails silently using default Android email client. Will think about adding SMTP support. Best regards, Alex.

comment: Perfect on GT SM-T325 (8.4pro)  and GT note8LTE . Use this app daily through out. Is recommended for IP and CCTV

author: Walter Fabian
comment: Completely surpasses other  IP cam apps, even the manufacturer ones! Has very useful features like PTZ configurable presets,  network scan and device detection.

author: John P
comment: Good app works well the only let down is the PTZ hit and miss when moving the cameras doesn't move or wont stop have to keep pressing the button, presets work great 4200  doesn't work with Swann 4550 can find it but will only show 1 frame and stops on that

reply.author: Tiny Solutions LLC
reply.content:
Please contact app support by email and tell us what exact camera model you have.

Best regards,
Alex.

author: Tommy Dempsey
comment: It's a nice app, but it keeps having issues connecting to some of my WyzeCam devices.
